children.title: Introduction
children.description: A lightweight, standalone npm package that adds full Progressive Web App support to Remix ðŸ’¿. Let's dive right in!

children.title: Installation
children.description: Install Remix PWA and get started building your next PWA.

children.title: Community
children.description: Get support, share ideas, requests, how-tos and much more from the Remix community.

children.title: Roadmap
children.description: Take a peek at the next things rolling out. Should be updated regularly

children.title: Contribute
children.description: Wanna contribute to `remix-pwa`? Here's how to get started.

children.title: FAQs
children.description: Popular questions (and answers!) I've gotten so far about Remix PWA plus some.

children.title: Quickstart
children.description: This guide will get you all set up and ready to use `remix-pwa` in your Remix application.

children.description: Build your PWA from scratch with `remix-pwa` modules

children.title: @remix-pwa/sw
children.description: Everything Service Worker is being handled here. Come and check it out!

children.description: Push notifications for your PWA (rolling out soon)

children.title: @remix-pwa/client
children.description: Everything utils and APIs to give your PWA superpowers and the authentic feeling!

children.title: Introduction
children.description: Explore the realms of Service Workers with Remix utilizing Remix PWA's very own extensible module!

children.title: Upgrade Guide
children.description: A guide to upgrade to the latest version of `@remix-pwa/sw` from previous versions.

children.title: Basic Setup
children.description: Learn how to install and setup a basic Service Worker in Remix

children.title: Extending your SW
children.description: Learn how to extend the capabilities of your Service Worker and Remix PWA with this guide.

children.title: Workbox
children.description: Take advantage of Workbox in your Remix applications.

children.title: useSWEffect()
children.description: A hook to monitor and handle navigation events in your Remix application.

children.title: Explore Plugins
children.description: Check out all the new fuzzy and fiery plugins available for Remix PWA ðŸ”¥

children.title: Create a Plugin
children.description: Understand how plugins works and how you can create one to plug into @remix-pwa/sw module

children.title: Cache Strategy
children.description: Under-the-hood view of what makes up caching in Remix PWA

children.title: Message Handler
children.description: Explore how Remix PWA handles communication between the Service Worker and your application.

children.title: Plugin Reference
children.description: Check the interfaces that make up the plugin system in Remix PWA. Plus, how to implement them yourself.

children.title: Helper Reference
children.description: Check out the little, yet mighty functions exposed by Remix PWA sw module to help you build your own custom service worker.

children.title: Introduction
children.description: Integrate Push Notifications into your Remix app easier than ever before!

children.title: Get Started
children.description: Learn how to get started with the Remix PWA Push package.

children.title: Create a strategy
children.description: Extend your Service Worker by creating your own Push custom strategy.

children.title: Create a Plugin
children.description: Learn how to create a plugin for your custom Push strategy.

children.title: Chat Application
children.description: Learn how to utilise Push Notifications well by building a chat application.

children.title: Push API Reference
children.description: Explore the Push API Reference for Remix PWA.
